task.title: View Data Metrics
task.shortdesc: View statistics about data collections on the Data Collection Metrics tab of the System Metrics page.

step.cmd: Open the System Metrics page, by clicking the System Metrics icon in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The System Metrics page opens showing the Global Metrics pane and the Data Metrics pane.

step.cmd: Select the data collections to include in the query.

info.p: By default, the Data Metrics pane shows a current snapshot of data collection metrics and includes the data from all data collections. To view information for a different set of data collections, click the drop-down arrow in the Data Collections field and check each data collection you want included in the metrics. If you want to include all data collections, check All to select them all in one operation.

step.cmd: Choose the query period. Select Now or select Date Range and specify the dates in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

info.p: The results of your query are displayed below the selection parameters.
If the query period is Now, the system shows the metrics as a set of ring graphs.

When a date range is specified, the system draws an X-Y graph showing ingestion events for the specified data collections. You can hover your cursor over an ingestion event to view specific data metrics for each data collection.
